participant_1.background:
I play the piano and guitar and sing.
I am a musician and hope to make it big some day.
My favorite type of music to sing is folk music.
I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.
My parents are not very supportive of my dream.

participant_2.background:
My main transportation is my motorbike.
I have light skin with big brown eyes.
I waitress during the day to supplement my income.
I wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head.
Its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

content.text: Hi! I'm a musician. I play the piano, guitar, and sing. My favorite type of music to sing is folk music. I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. My parents are not very supportive of my dream.

Hi! I'm a waitress during the day to supplement my income. I ride a motorcycle as my main transportation. I have light skin and big brown eyes. My helmet is red with a blue stripe so it shines when I race.
Nice to meet you! Do you have any music you'd like to share?
I do! I just released a new album called "Folk on the Road." It's a collection of original folk songs that I wrote and recorded myself.
That's awesome! I'd love to listen to it.
Here's a link to my website. You can download it there.
Thanks! I'll check it out.
You're welcome!
So, what's it like being a waitress?
It's challenging, but it's also a lot of fun. I get to meet all sorts of interesting people.
That sounds like it could be really rewarding.
It is! I love being able to make people's day a little brighter.
That's awesome.
Thanks!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on motorcycle rides, play music, and hang out with friends.
Those all sound like fun activities.
They are! I love to be active and enjoy my life.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy.
Thanks! I am. I'm grateful for everything in my life.
That's good to hear.
I'm glad we got to chat.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Bye!
